content.text:
# Draft:Aodhán King

| birth_place        = Sydney, New South Wales, Australia
| years_active       = 2012-present
| website            = https://www.aodhanking.co/
}}
Aodhán King (born 25 December 1992) is an Australian Christian music artist. He was a founding member of the Christian worship band, Hillsong Young & Free from its formation in 2012 until 2025, when King announced he was no longer part of the band.
Early life
King was born in Sydney on Christmas Day, 1992 to Indian and Irish parents. In 2004, King joined Hillsong's youth ministry. In the preceding years, he taught himself guitar and become a member of Hillsong's staff.
